item.title: John add a quote by William S. Burroughs
item.description: "A paranoid is someone who knows a little of what's going on. A psychotic is a guy who's just found out what's going on." -- William S. Burroughs

item.title: John add a quote by James Joyce
item.description: "History, Stephen said, is a nightmare from which I am trying to awake." -- James Joyce

item.title: John add a quote by Stephen Spender
item.description: "All that you can imagine you already know" -- Stephen Spender

item.title: John add a quote by Dylan Thomas
item.description: "A good poem is a contribution to reality. The world is never the same once a good poem has been added to it. A good poem helps to change the shape of the universe, helps to extend everyone's knowledge of himself and the world around him." -- Dylan Thomas

item.title: John add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "Beauty is only skin deep, but ugly goes clean to the bone." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: John add a quote by Djuna Barnes
item.description: "A man is whole only when he takes into account his shadow." -- Djuna Barnes

item.title: John add a quote by Stevie Smith
item.description:
"Not Waving but Drowning
Nobody heard him, the dead man, But still he lay moaning: I was much further out than you thought And not waving but drowning.
Poor chap, he always loved larking And now he's dead It must have been too cold for him his heart gave way, They said.
Oh, no no no, it was too cold always (Still the dead one lay moaning) I was much too far out all my life And not waving but drowning." -- Stevie Smith

item.title: John add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: John add a quote by Tatjana Soli
item.description: "The hardest thing was to give meaning to what appeared to have none." -- Tatjana Soli

item.title: John add a quote by Tatjana Soli
item.description: "Why did someone fall in love with you because you are one thing and then want you to be something else?" -- Tatjana Soli

item.title: John add a quote by Frank O'Hara
item.description: "Now I am quietly waiting for the catastrophe of my personality to seem beautiful again, and interesting, and modern." -- Frank O'Hara
